trans-unit.source: Represents a 16-bit signed integer to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
trans-unit.target: 表示要存储在或从数据库中检索一个 16 位带符号的整数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure using the supplied short integer parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>结构使用提供的短整型参数。

trans-unit.source: Computes the sum of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operands.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the sum of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operands.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含两个总和<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>操作数。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise AND of its <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operands.
trans-unit.target: 计算的按位 AND 其<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the results of the bitwise AND.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含结果的按位 and。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise OR of its two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operands.
trans-unit.target: 计算其两个的按位 OR <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the results of the bitwise OR.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含结果的按位 OR。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> instance to the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 比较此<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>实例与所提供<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>并返回对其相对值的指示。

trans-unit.source: A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个带符号的数字，指示该实例和对象的相对值。

trans-unit.source: This instance is less than the object.
This instance is the same as the object.
This instance is greater than the object -or- The object is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 此实例大于对象-该对象为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> instance to the supplied <xref:System.Object> and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 比较此<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>实例与所提供<xref:System.Object>并返回对其相对值的指示。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个带符号的数字，指示该实例和对象的相对值。

trans-unit.source: This instance is less than the object.
This instance is the same as the object.
This instance is greater than the object -or- object is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 此实例大于对象-或-对象为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)

trans-unit.source: Divides the first <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operand by the second.
trans-unit.target: 将第一个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>操作数除以第二个操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the results of the division.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>其<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含除法运算的结果。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified object to the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 比较指定的对象和<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> and the two are equal; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对象的实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>和两种方法是相等; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical comparison of two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structures to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 执行逻辑比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>结构，以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two values are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果两个值相等。

trans-unit.source: If either instance is null, then the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlInt16" name="SqlInt16" href=""></xref> will be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一实例为 null，则<xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlInt16" name="SqlInt16" href=""></xref>将为 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。
32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value that indicates the XSD of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>值，该值指示指定的 XSD <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>以确定第一个是否大于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is greater than the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果第一个实例大于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>结构，以确定第一个是否大于或等于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>的第一个实例是否大于或等于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否这<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>结构为 null。
有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 Null 值](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> to determine whether the first is less than the second.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>以确定第一个是否小于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果第一个实例小于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is less than or equal to the second.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>结构，以确定第一个是否小于或等于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than or equal to the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果第一个实例小于或等于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
A constant representing the largest possible value of a <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个常数，表示的最大可能值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 32,767.
A constant representing the smallest possible value of a <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个常数，表示的最小可能值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is -32,768.
Computes the remainder after dividing its first <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operand by its second.
trans-unit.target: 计算其第一个相除的余数<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>操作数除以第二个操作数操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> contains the remainder.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>包含该余数。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Divides two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> values and returns the remainder.
trans-unit.target: 将两个划分<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>值并返回余数。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of `x` or `y` is null, the value is null.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一实例`x`或`y`是 null，则值为 null。

trans-unit.source: The remainder left after division is performed on x and y.
trans-unit.target: 在执行除法后剩余 x 和 y 。

trans-unit.source: Computes the product of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> parameters.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> contains the product of the two parameters.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>包含两个参数的乘积。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical comparison of two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 执行逻辑比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>结构，以确定它们是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果两个实例是否不相等或<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果两个实例是否相等。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Represents a <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> that can be assigned to this instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> ，可以将其分配到此实例的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Null functions as a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16> structure.
trans-unit.target: 为函数 null 作为常量<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16>结构。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16>
有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 Null 值](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The ~ operator performs a bitwise one's complement operation on its <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> operand.
trans-unit.target: ~ 运算符将执行按位二进制反码运算上其<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref>操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the complement of the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含指定的求补<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>结构。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Computes the sum of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operands.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the sum of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operands.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含两个总和<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>操作数。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise AND of its <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operands.
trans-unit.target: 计算的按位 AND 其<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the results of the bitwise AND.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含结果的按位 and。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise OR of its two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operands.
trans-unit.target: 计算其两个的按位 OR <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the results of the bitwise OR.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含结果的按位 OR。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Divides the first <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> operand by the second.
trans-unit.target: 将第一个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>操作数除以第二个操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the results of the division.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>其<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含除法运算的结果。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical comparison of two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structures to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 执行逻辑比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>结构，以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果两个实例是否相等或<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果两个实例是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 执行按位异或运算上提供的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*> property contains the results of the bitwise XOR.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"> </xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>属性包含结果的按位 XOR。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16.Value*>
